nodes.text: G0-16 was a fan-tan dealer droid that worked at the Fifteen Moons Casino on the planet Ord Mantell. The droid lacked sympathy for the players, and would routinely skip over players who didn't meet its eye during gameplay.

G0-16 once tried to ignore Han Solo's bid during a game, shortly after the Battle of Yavin. At the time, Solo was being distracted by a small droid dispatched by Alfreda Goot. Solo subsequently argued with the droid, causing a Rodian pit-boss to intervene and allow Solo to place his bid.
